form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Petition; Marriage Affidavit; Extra photograph, NARA Form 1024

full_text: 0.24 Screened by NARA, 7/6/2023 21. I am submitting the following personal documents in support of and as part of my application Translation & Affidavit re: name Birth certificate Military record Promise of employment Police certificate Evidence of support or own resources Medical record(s) Other (describe) Petition; Marriage Affidavit; Extra photograph 22. Name and present residence of my /Tife/husband is (Give maiden name of wife) S PARBHUBHAI FAKIRBHAI PATEL. DECEAED IN THE YEAR 1948. 23. The names and addresses of my children under 21 years of age are NOT APPLICABLE 24. The names of members of my family who are immigrating with me are NOT APPLICABLE 25. The name and address of my father is (If deceased, so state, giving date) NARANBHAI RANCHHODBHAI PATEL. DECEASED IN THE YEAR 1908. 26. The maiden name and address of my mother is (If deceased, so state, giving date) GOMATBEN FAKIRABHAI PATEL. DECEASED IN THE YEAR 1935. 27. The name and address of my next of kin in my home country is At & P.O. Viraval, Patel St., Taluka JIVANBHAI PARBHUBHAI PATEL, SON.- Navsari, Bulsar District, India 28. Since my sixteenth birthday my places of residence for 6 months or more have been City or town Province Country Dates (From-To) Calling or occupation VAGHECH,DIST.SURAT, GUJARAT, INDIA. JUNE 1915 to APRIL 1920. HOUSEHOLD. VIRAVAL, BIST BULSAR, GUJARAT, INDIA, MAY 1920 to UPTO DAY HOUSEHOLD, 29. Since my sixteenth birthday I am or have been a member or affiliate of the following political, professional, vocational or social organizations Type of membership and Name and address Dates (From-To) office held, if any NOT APPLICABLE 30. I speak, read, write the following languages (Include your native language) Language Speak Read Write GUJARATI YES X NO NO 31.
